doc.name: EPS
doc.summary: A control that displays Encapsulated PostScript (EPS).

examples.example: set the postscript of EPS "Preview" to field "Code"

description.p: Use the EPS object type to display a screen preview of a PostScript file, or to show PostScript graphics.
This object type is supported only on Unix systems with Display PostScript installed.
An EPS object is contained in a card, group, or background. EPS objects cannot contain other objects.
